snippet: Less than two months in power, the moderate Islamic party of Prime Minister Abdelilah Benkirane is pushing to relax strict abortion laws.
abstract: Moderate Islamic party of Moroccan Prime Minister Abdelilah Benkirane, after less than two months in power, is pushing to relax strict abortion laws.
lead_paragraph: Less than two months in power, the moderate Islamic party of Prime Minister Abdelilah Benkirane is pushing to relax strict abortion laws.

headline.main: New Prime Minister Surprises Moroccans With Support for Abortion
headline.print_headline: New Moroccan Government Seeks Relaxed Abortion Laws
